menu_buy_description: Purchase the necessary items to complete the job.
menu_sell_description: Sell or trade the items you obtained from the job.
menu_get_job_description: Receive a new job at a random location.
menu_cancel_current_job_description: Cancel the job you accepted; you will need to wait for a new one.
not_enough_police: There are not enough police officers in the city.
all_jobs_received: All available jobs have been received, then try again.
insufficient_item: You don't have enough items in the quantity you selected.
job_start: The target house is marked on the GPS. Disrupt the house keypad with a welding machine.
job_duration: You have %s minutes to finish the job.
job_canceled: The current job has been canceled.
robbery_duration_timeout: You were taken out because the robbery time expired.
job_finished: There is nothing left to buy at home, the job is done, you can sell the stuff to the person you got the job from.
sell_all_items_description: Sell all job-related items in bulk
not_completely_finished: There are still searchable & collectable items at home, the work is not finished.
